SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController is the class that manages all user actions by executing the corresponding method or task

  • Method Details

    • access

      public void access(Client client, String nickname, String pwd, boolean isRegistered)
      Executes the task for login/registration
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      nickname - nickname of that client
      pwd - password
      isRegistered - true if already registered, false otherwise

    • giveLobbies

      public void giveLobbies(Client client)
      Notifies the client about all available lobbies
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(Client client, Integer idLobby)
      Adds client in the request lobby and notifies that client if the request lobby is not present
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      idLobby - id of request lobby

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(Client client, int numOfPlayer)
      Creates a lobby
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      numOfPlayer - number of player of the new lobby

    • playInitCard

      public void playInitCard(Client client, Integer idCard, boolean isBackSide)
      Executes the task that manages the play of the initial card
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      idCard - id of the initial card
      isBackSide - true if client wants to play back side of the card, false otherwise

    • setPersonalGoal

      public void setPersonalGoal(Client client, Integer idCard)
      Executes the task that manages the choice of the objective(goal) card
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      idCard - id of the objective(goal) card

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Client client, Integer idCard, int[] position, boolean isBackSide)
      Executes the task that manages the play of a card
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      idCard - id of card
      position - position that client want to place
      isBackSide - true if client wants to play back side of the card, false otherwise

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Client client, LocationType location, Integer idCard)
      Executes the task that manages the draw of a card
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who made the action
      location - the LocationType that indicates where the client drew the card
      idCard - id of card

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(Client client)
      Executes the task that manages the disconnection of a user in game
      Parameters:
      client - the Client who left the game

      Parameters:
      message - the ChatMessage that contains all chat information
